bill_title: require a vote before regional cooperatives can engage in certain activities.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to require a vote before regional cooperatives can engage in certain activities. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. A regional cooperative shall receive an affirmative vote of not less than two-thirds of its patrons before a cooperative can feed, raise, or breed livestock or engage in any activity that would be recognized as direct competition with the cooperative's patrons. 750 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.016 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
